author.about: IT enthusiast coming with over 4+ years of professional experience as a \textit{{Data Engineer}} and 1+ years of professional experience as a \textit{{Platform/DevOps Engineer}}. I have worked with various production systems and clients, as a team member and as a one-man band. I am a positive, detail-oriented, productive individual with a can-do attitude driven by impact.

roles.title: Backend Developer
description: Enhancement and maintenance of a Python FastAPI Application

roles.title: Cloud Engineer
description: Led the migration of a production system from DigitalOcean to Azure Kubernetes Service, improving system scalability and reliability.
Designed and implemented a CI/CD pipeline using OpenTofu, GitHub Actions, and Kubernetes, streamlining the deployment process and reducing manual errors.
Consolidated multiple environment-specific infrastructure stacks into a single OpenTofu stack, improving consistency and reducing maintenance overhead across environments.

roles.title: DataOps Engineer
description: Developed a version-controlled SQL CI/CD pipeline using Python, AWS, and Snowflake technologies, improving deployment speed and reliability for multiple SQL development teams.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and clients to design tailored solutions, handling discovery, requirements gathering, and strategy discussions.
Built and maintained the CI/CD infrastructure, streamlining data warehouse development across teams.

roles.title: Data Engineer
description: Developed a Python ELT pipeline on AWS, optimizing data processing and flow.
Collaborated with system architects to design a scalable, efficient data architecture for downstream analytics.
Delivered a robust ETL solution, ensuring data consistency and quality.

roles.title: BI Developer
description: Supported and enhanced enterprise ETL solutions using Oracle technologies (ODI, WebLogic), Tibco Data Virtualization, and Spotfire BI, improving data availability and reporting accuracy.
Transitioned into a Mid-Level Data Engineer role, leading efforts to optimize ETL processes and improve system performance.
Provided analysis and input during discovery phases, evaluating the impact of proposed solutions on business operations.

roles.title: SQL Developer
description: Contributed to the development of a data warehouse using SQL on on-premise servers, ensuring data integration and reporting accuracy.
Automated testing with Python, reducing manual testing and ensuring data integrity.
